<p align="center"><img src="https://www.oveleon.de/share/github-assets/contao-cookiebar/ccb_logo.svg" width="300"></p>
<p align="center"><i>This cookie bar is for the Contao Open Source CMS and allows a visitor to define cookie & privacy settings for the website.</i></p>
<p align="center">
    <a href="https://www.oveleon.de"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/oveleon-maintained-83aa0e?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="Oveleon"></a>
    <a href="https://github.com/oveleon/contao-cookiebar"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/license-AGPLv3-83aa0e?style=flat-square"/></a>
    <a href="https://packagist.org/packages/oveleon/contao-cookiebar"><img src="https://img.shields.io/packagist/dt/oveleon/contao-cookiebar?color=0A7BBC&style=flat-square"/></a>
</p>
<br/>

### Features
- Flexible script integration
- Vanilla JS
- Expandable
- Consent Log
- Free & Open Source

### Services
- Custom (Script)
- Custom (Template)
- Google Analytics
- Google Consent Mode
- Facebook Pixel
- Matomo
- Matomo Tag Manager
- etracker
- iFrame
  - YouTube
  - Vimeo
  - Google Maps
  - OpenStreetMap
  - [add more...](docs/EXTEND_IFRAME.md)
- [add more...](docs/EXTEND_TYPE.md)

### Documentation
- [Install](docs/INSTALL.md)
- [Configuration (Basics)](docs/BASICS.md)
  - [Create Configuration](docs/CONFIGURATION.md)
  - [Create Group](docs/GROUP.md)
  - [Create Cookie (Type)](docs/COOKIE.md)
- [Module & Content-Element](docs/MOD_CE_MISC.md)
- [Styling & Customization](docs/CUSTOMIZATION.md)
- [Extend iFrame-Types](docs/EXTEND_IFRAME.md)
- [Extend Cookie-Types](docs/EXTEND_TYPE.md)
- [Extended usage](docs/EXTENDED_USAGE.md)

### Contributing
To build JavaScript and CSS files the following commands can be used:
```npm
npm install
npm run-script buildjs
npm run-script buildcss
```

### Community Extensions
- [Contao Cookiebar Optin](https://github.com/postyou/contao-cookiebar-optin): Extends the cookie bar with an opt-in functionality for content elements. ([@postyou](https://github.com/postyou))

<br>

> This Consent Tool does **not** need its own cookies. Please **do not refer to Oveleon** within your website, no data will be passed to Oveleon!
